Picture-perfect Kitchen Remodeling

We make remodeling your kitchen easy — and we do it with a smile!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Kitchen-Remodel-Service.jpg” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”60px|30px|60px|30px|false|true”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_color=”off” custom_margin=”80px||80px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false”]

Great designs. Better service.

Time to update appliances? Breathe new life into an outdated design? Add more storage? Make space to entertain or accommodate your growing family? When design and build come together, there’s no limit to what we can do!

But we believe the only thing better than our kitchen designs is our commitment to your satisfaction. Your kitchen should reflect you, your family, and how you live.

You’ll appreciate our attention to detail, deep knowledge of design styles, and passion for creating classic, timeless, and functional kitchens.

We design it. We build it. You love it.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Testimonials and Awards” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ z_index_tablet=”500″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_image=”off” background_repeat=”repeat-y” background_blend=”soft-light” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”|10%||10%|false|true”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_slider module_class=”home-quote-container” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_font=”Playfair Display|600|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ width=”90%” width_tablet=”70%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” min_height=”340px” min_height_tablet=”” min_height_phone=”” min_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” height_tablet=”” height_phone=”” height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin=”|auto||15%|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”|auto||auto|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||auto|false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

Having a complementary skills of both a designer and a builder/project manager has taken away most of the stress normally associated with remodeling. The project has consistently been on time and on budget. The attention to detail has been exacting, and the craftsmen that Mosaik has brought in to work on the project have been of equally high quality.

– TAMMI V.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][et_pb_slider disabled_on=”on|on|off” module_class=”home-quote-container” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_font=”Playfair Display|600|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ width=”90%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” min_height=”340px” min_height_tablet=”” min_height_phone=”” min_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” height_tablet=”” height_phone=”” height_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_margin=”|15%||auto|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”|auto|||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||5%” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

Erin and Scott are true professionals and a delight to work with. Erin came up with a plan that was both elegant and different from all the other ideas that we’d gathered. Scott takes great pride in both the work that is produced, onsite, and in his schedule. Both Scott and Erin are attentive, always available to help with any questions and bring great ideas and great energy.

– ILENE S.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Period-Glamour-2.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_enable_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”60px|30px|60px|30px|false|false”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_enable_color=”off” custom_margin=”60px||60px|||”]

What is design-build?

This isn’t just kitchen remodeling. Our design-build process makes us a true one-stop shop. We do it all from start to finish.

Here at Mosaik Design & Remodeling, we’ve developed a kitchen remodeling process built around:

Preparation – Our kitchen designers and builders work closely together as one seamless unit. There’s no confusion and we eliminate the hassles traditionally associated with kitchen remodeling.

Communication – We talk to each other — and to you — throughout the project. We’ll check in and update you on our progress. You’ll know what’s happening and how things are going.

Execution – Our kitchen builders work quickly and efficiently to minimize the disruption to your daily routine.

That’s design-build.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ Say hello!

Thoughtful, stylish, and modern interior design

Down to the smallest detail, our experienced interior designers put the finishing touches on your newly remodeled kitchen. We can recommend luxury appliances, stylish furnishings, artwork, and anything else that’s needed. Best of all, you’ll work with our interior designers from the very beginning of your kitchen remodel to ensure everything fits perfectly into place.

LEARN MORE

excerpt.rendered: Picture-perfect Kitchen Remodeling We make remodeling your kitchen easy — and we do it with a smile!Great designs. Better service. Time to update appliances? Breathe new life into an outdated design? Add more storage? Make space to entertain or accommodate your growing family? When design and build come together, there’s no limit to what we […]
